snippet: Newt Gingrich became the latest Republican candidate to lash out at the cable news network, accusing it on Wednesday of dooming his flagging campaign by slanting its political coverage to Mitt Romney's benefit.
abstract: Newt Gingrich became the latest Republican candidate to lash out at the cable news network, accusing it on Wednesday of dooming his flagging campaign by slanting its political coverage to Mitt Romney's benefit.

headline.main: Gingrich Accuses Fox News of Bias
headline.print_headline: Accusations: Gingrich Blasts Fox News, And Fox News Blasts Back
